metadata.title: CVE-2024-53986 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: rails-html-sanitizer is responsible for sanitizing HTML fragments in Railsapplications. There is a possible XSS vulnerability with certainconfigurations of Rails::HTML::Sanitizer 1.6.0 when used with Rails >=7.1.0. A possible XSS vulnerability with certain configurations ofRails::HTML::Sanitizer may allow an attacker to inject content if HTML5sanitization is enabled and the application developer has overridden thesanitizer's allowed tags where the "math" and "style" elements are bothexplicitly allowed. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.6.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-html-sanitizer package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
